title: To the Lighthouse
brief_description: A film adaptation of Virginia Woolf’s most popular novel. Set in a delightful holiday home in Cornwall overlooked by a distant lighthouse which holds a haunting attraction for members of this Edwardian family. A compelling story of family relationships.
